result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Christopher Patrick was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Entry into Locked Vehicle [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.11.
  • Criminal Damage to Property [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Concurrent with count two and 15CF1486. Credit for 60 days.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

Provide a DNA sample for the data bank, pay all appropriate costs.
Pay all applicable costs, surcharges and supervision fees.
All court costs, fees and surcharges be paid through collection by DOC from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of Extended Supervision/probation on 15CF1486.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.

OTHER CONDITIONS:  
Participate in alcohol and drug assessment. Successfully complete recomended treatment.
Maintain absolute sobriety.  No drugs or alcohol.
Random urine screens and breathalyzer tests.
Do  not frequent places where alcohol or illegal drugs are sold, distributed or used.
Pay all applicable coss, surcharges and supervision fees while on probation on 15CF1486 or civil judgment will be entered with tax intercept.
Concurrent with: Concurrent with count one and 15CF1486. Credit for 60 days.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Christopher Patrick

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: SENTENCING Transcript commencing 06-24-2016 received and filed.  Original transcript in case file 2015CF001486 (18 Pages).

Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in court with attorney Debra Jeanne Patterson.  Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

Statements made as to sentencing by State, Defense and Defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant sentenced to serve SIXTY (60) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for SIXTY (60) DAYS time served.  CONCURRENT TO COUNT 2 AND 15CF1486.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

AS TO COUNT 2:

Defendant sentenced to serve SIXTY (60) DAYS in the House of Correction with credit for SIXTY (60) DAYS time served.  CONCURRENT TO COUNT 1 AND 15CF1486.  TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.

OTHER CONDITIONS:

* Defendant to participate in Alcohol and Drug Assessment and successfully complete recommended treatment.
* Maintain absolute sobriety.  No drugs.  No alcohol. 
* Random urine screens and breathalyzer test.
* DO NOT frequent places where alcohol or illegal drugs are sold, distributed or used.
* Defendant to pay all applicable costs, surcharges and supervision fees WHILE ON PROBATION ON 15CF1486 or CIVIL JUDGMENT will be entered WITH tax intercept.

The Court ordered that all court costs, fees and surcharges be paid through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of probation/extended supervision on 15CF1486.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.

Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs.

Filed,
Notice of Right to Seek Post-conviction Relief;
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit.

Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in court with attorney Debra Jeanne Patterson.  Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg

DTC - PHASE I

The defendant is not in compliance with the terms of the Milwaukee County Drug Court Deferred Prosecution Agreement.  Based upon the defendant's non-compliance and State's motion, the court revoked the Milwaukee County Drug Court Deferred Prosecution Agreement; proceedings reinstated.  Court orders entry of Judgment of Conviction.  Court ordered case adjourned for sentencing in br. 33.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 24, 2016 at 10:00 am.
Clerk spoke with Defense Attorney to schedule Return on Warrant. Case calendared for Return on Warrant on 5/26/2016 at 2:30 p.m.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Debra Jeanne Patterson in court.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  sdg  

Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

Matter is adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for March 4, 2016 at 09:30 am.

DTC - PHASE I

Matter in Court for Review.  State moves to revoke the DPA.  Defense objects and requests matter be staffed.  Defense moves to have Defendant REMANDED pending the next date.  Court held colloquy with Defendant.  Defendant to compose letter regarding why he should be allowed to continue in the program.  COURT TAKES STATE'S MOTION UNDER ADVISEMENT AT THIS TIME.  COURT REMANDED DEFENDANT PENDING THE NEXT DATE.  Court ordered matter adjourned to Br. 33 for Review.  Review hearing scheduled for January 8, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE JUDGE ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Debra J. Patterson in court.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter scheduled for 9:30 am, case called at 4:00 pm.   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued.  NO BAIL IS FORFEITED.

  DTC - PHASE I

OFF THE RECORD.  Defendant is awaiting placement.  Review hearing scheduled for July 17, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Debra J. Patterson in court, defendant Michael Christopher Patrick not in court, in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk: LMS.

OFF THE RECORD.  Defendant is awaiting placement.   Case is adjourned for review hearing in Branch 6. FILE RETAINED IN COURT.  Review hearing scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Attorney Debra J. Patterson in court, Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick not in court, in custody.  David T. Malone appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Review hearing scheduled for July 2, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in court with attorney Debra J. Patterson.  Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.  

The parties have agreed to a Milwaukee County Drug Treatment Court deferred prosecution agreement and participation contract.
The defendant was advised of his constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, entered a plea of GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum to Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  The parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  The Court found the defendant guilty but WITHHELD entry of Judgement of Conviction.  The court approved the Milwaukee County Drug Treatment Court Deferred Prosecution Agreement and Participant Contract and ordered the proceedings suspended for an initial period of 12 months to 18 months.  Court ordered case adjourned for review hearing in Branch 6.  FILE RETAINED IN COURT.  Review hearing scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 09:30 am.
Case transferred to br 6 for drug treatment court admissions on 6/17/2015 at 1:30pm.  lms
JusticePoint Discharge Summary Report dated May 5, 2015 received and filed.
Justice Point Program Status update report dated April 14, 2015; received and filed. Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in court with student intern Cameron Weitzner under the student practice rule being supervised by attorney Terese Dick for attorney Enku Edgar Lin. Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.    Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial scheduled, Branch 37.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 09:00 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed. tk

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by drug testing and portable breathalyzers.  No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Addison W

Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in court with attorney Enku Edgar Lin.  Defendant Michael Christopher Patrick in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Defense moves to dismiss for lack of probable cause.  Arguments heard.  Court DENIES motion to dismiss.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
